facts.seriesTitle: Population below international poverty line (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population living below the extreme poverty line declined from 91.6 % in 1991 to 35.3% in 2012.

facts.seriesTitle: Employed population below international poverty line (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2012, 38.7 % of the country's workers and their families were living on less than 1.90 US dollars per person per day

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population living below the national poverty line (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of population living below the national poverty line declined from 62.6 % in 1994 to 55.2% in 2012.

facts.seriesTitle: Existence of legislative and/or regulatory provisions for managing disaster risk
facts.fact_text: As of 2015, Guinea has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Prevalence of undernourishment (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population suffering from hunger was 19.7 % in 2016 .

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age who are moderately or severely stunted (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, 32.4 % of children under 5 years of age had stunted growth

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age who are moderately or severely overweight
facts.fact_text: The share of overweight children under 5 years of age decreased from 5.1 % in 2005 to 4.0% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Maternal mortality ratio
facts.fact_text: The maternal mortality ratio decreased from 1040 per 100,000 live births in 1990 to 679 per 100,000 live births in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Under-five mortality rate
facts.fact_text: The mortality rate of children under 5 years of age fell from 165.4 per 1,000 live births in 2000 to 85.7 per 1,000 live births in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population
facts.fact_text: In 2017, there were about 0.66 people in every 100,000 uninfected population that became newly infected with HIV.

facts.seriesTitle: Participation rate in organized learning (one year before the official primary entry age)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, 41.16 % of children participated in pre-primary or primary education in the year prior to the official entrance age for primary school

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of women aged 20-24 years who were married or in a union before age 18 (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, 51.2 % of women between 20 to 24 years of age reported having been married before their eighteenth birthday

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of seats held by women in single or lower houses of parliament increased from 8.77 % in 2000 to 21.93% in 2018.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with access to electricity (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population with access to electricity increased from 16.51 % in 2000 to 33.5% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, less than 5 % of the population relied primarily on clean fuels and technology.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita (percent)
facts.fact_text: The annual growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita increased from 1.08 % in 2000 to 5.51% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption decreased from 4.97 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 3.76 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Unemployment rate of population 15 years of age and older
facts.fact_text: The total unemployment rate was 4.6 % in 2002.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population covered by at least a 2G mobile network (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 99.9 % of the population was in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal

facts.seriesTitle: Labour share of GDP, comprising wages and social protection transfers (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2010, 14.9 % of GDP was from labour, comprising wages and social protection transfers

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of urban population living in slums (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the urban population living in slums declined from 80.4 % in 1990 to 43.3% in 2014.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter in cities (micrograms per cubic meter)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, the annual population-weighted average mean concentration of fine suspended particles of less than 2.5 microns in diameter (PM2.5) was about 22.43 micrograms per cubic metre. This is above the maximum level for safety set by WHO of 10 micrograms per cubic metre.

facts.seriesTitle: Existence of legislative and/or regulatory provisions for managing disaster risk
facts.fact_text: As of 2015, Guinea has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption decreased from 4.97 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 3.76 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Existence of legislative and/or regulatory provisions for managing disaster risk
facts.fact_text: As of 2015, Guinea has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Coverage of protected areas in relation to marine areas (Exclusive Economic Zones) (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2018, 0.53 % of the marine environment under national jurisdiction (up to 200 nautical miles from shore) was under protection.

facts.seriesTitle: Forest area as a proportion of total land area (percent)
facts.fact_text: Land area covered by forest declined from 28.1 % in 2000 to 25.9% in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of freshwater key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (percent)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of freshwater key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 98.51 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (percent)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 78.87 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population
facts.fact_text: In 2015, the intentional homicide rate was 8.82 per 100,000 population.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, there were about 74.6 % of children under age 5 whose births were registered with a civil authority

facts.seriesTitle: Volume of remittances as a proportion of total GCP (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, the inflow of personal remittances was 0.64 % of GDP.

facts.seriesTitle: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services (percent)
facts.fact_text: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services was approximately2.52 % in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Fixed internet broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , fixed-broadband internet penetration reached 0.01 % of the population.

facts.seriesTitle: Existence of national statistical plans that are fully funded
facts.fact_text: As of 2018, Guinea.
